snippet.title: Simon the Sorcerer - Game Play
snippet.description:
If this video has you in the mood to play, you can download the full game (updated for Windows 7/Vista/XP) at http://bit.ly/hE3qu8 or get the original DOS demo at http://www.demu.org

Ten minutes of game play from the demo of the adventure game published by Infocom in 1993.
